content: snowflake wishes - simple quick snowflakes which when blocked with pva glue and glitter make pretty christmas tree ornaments perfect to slip in a holiday card for friends and colleagues this pattern works with any yarn but i designed it with dk through aran weights in mind for snowflakes which are about 9-12cm 3 5-4 7in across in addition to yarn you will need a needle to sew in ends ribbon or thread and optionally pva glue and glitter stay up to date - you can follow me on facebook if you d like to keep up to date with future patterns facebook com/wishesintherain 1 ♥ 1 https //www facebook com/wishesintherain
